attributes.action: stop the      use of Lay magistrates who are not legally trained,even though      they deal with around 95% of court cases in england and wales.      and to replace them with magistrates that are appropriately      trained.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
to stop the
     use of Lay magistrates who are not legally trained,even though
     they deal with around 95% of court cases in england and wales.
     and to replace them with magistrates that are appropriately
     trained.
